text.author: Wikivoyage community (see URL)
text.title: Morgan Hill
text.head: Morgan Hill
text.p:
Morgan Hill
is a city in
Santa Clara County
,
California
, at the southern tip of
Silicon Valley
, in the
San Francisco Bay Area
. Morgan Hill is primarily an affluent residential community for Silicon Valley , as well as the seat for several high-tech companies .
text.head: Get in
text.p:
Morgan Hill sits astride US 101 , a major north-south highway that spans the Pacific coast from
San Diego
to
Seattle
. Commercial air service is via
Mineta San Jose International Airport
, approximately 20 miles to the north . Morgan Hill also is connected to
San Jose
and
San Francisco
by
Caltrain
service , but only during peak commute hours .
Time Table

list.item:
Morgan Hill railway station
, 17300 Depot St.

text.head: Get around
text.p:
Santa Clara Valley bus service
schedule
.
text.head: See

list.item:
Henry Coe State Park
. Is the largest state park in northern California . It is open year-round for hikers , mountain bikers , backpackers , equestrians , car campers , picnickers , and photographers .

Anderson Lake County Park
, 19245 Malaguerra Ave , ☏ +1408 779-3634 . Park office : . It is great for hiking , running , biking , and skating on paved trails . The lake is open for boating and fishing . Jet-ski 's and float tubes are permitted .

text.head: Wineries & Vineyards

list.item:
Guglielmo Winery
, 1480 E Main Ave ( across from Live Oak HS ) , ☏ +1408 779-2145 .

Morgan Hill Cellars
, 1645 San Pedro Winery , ☏ +1 408-779-7389 , ✉ wines@morganhillcellars.com .

Sycamore Creek Winery
. Located west of Morgan Hill on Sycamore Rd .

Kirigins Winery
. Located west of Morgan Hill on Uvas Rd .

EmmaLily Vineyards
, 2105 Dahlberg Drive , Morgan Hill , CA 95037 , ☏ +14086559197 .

Seeker Vineyard
, 11755 Turlock Ave , San Martin , CA 95046 , toll-free : +1 949 370-1040 .

text.head: Entertainment

list.item:
Cinelux theaters
( Off of Tennant Street , between Monterey and 101 ) .

text.head: Buy
text.p: Shopping areas include downtown and the Cochrane area .
text.head: Eat

list.item:
Aoi Japanese Restaurant
, 35 East Main Ave , ☏ +1408 776-7763 . Authentic Japanese food and the service is even true Japanese style .

Betsy 's Restaurant & Lounge
, 650 Tennant Station ( in the bowling alley ) , ☏ +1408 779-3721 . Great food and some of the best prime rib served on weekends .

China Orchid
, 16715 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 776-1714 . Chinese food .

China Star
, 233 West Main Av , ☏ +1408 778-9898 . Chinese food . good food and nice atmosphere .

La Choza Taqueria
, 17865 Monterey St #F ( corner of Wright St ) , ☏ +1408 782-7873 . Mexican food .

The Capri
, 18625 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 778-5642 . Used to be a hot spot in the 50s as a restaurant , place to dance , and a bar . The Capri was closed and has been the host to many different restaurants . Later it was turned into a Mexican restaurant called " El Capri " . After El Capri closed a single taco cart going by the same name sat outside the vacant building until they moved to San Martin ( just south of Morgan Hill on Monterey Rd . ) . Now the building that once was a hot spot in the 50s where people went to dance , drink and eat(such as my grandparents ) , it sits vacant . This historic landmark is certainly an eye catcher and is sad to see it not being used .

El Toro Brewery
( corner of Main and Monterey ) .

Flying Dragon
, 17340 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 779-6296 . Chinese food .

Golden China
, 16925 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 778-1878 . Chinese food . Also includes free eggroll . Cheap .

Golden Oak
, 16695 Condit Rd , ☏ +1408 779-8085 . Upscale American cuisine .

Aoi
, 35 East Main Av , ☏ +1408 776-7763 . Excellent Japanese food .

Izakaya
, 17415 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 778-0505 . Japanese .

Just Breakfast
, 17415 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 779-7044 . Long established diner downtown . Breakfast is specialty but other foods are served .

Maurizio 's
, 25 E. First St , ☏ +1408 782-7550 . Italian cuisine & seafood .

Moon 's Kitchen
, 16985 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 778-3883 . Asian cuisine .

Peking
, 92 E 2nd St , ☏ +1408 779-0333 . Chinese cuisine .

Pink Elephant Bakery #2
, 16925 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 778-9088 . Bakery specializing in Mexican baked goods .

Rosy 's at the Beach
, 17320 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 778-0551 . California cuisine ; seafood .

Sinaloa Cafe
, 17535 Monterey Highway , ☏ +1408 779-9740 . Mexican cuisine .

Taqueria El Grullense
, 16760 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 779-9063 . Mexican food .

Mr. Falafel
, 17455 Monterey St ( Downtown Morgan Hill ) , ☏ +1408 778-7777 . 11AM-10PM . Mediterranean and Vegetarian food prepared to order . Sharwma , Kefta Kabob , Hummus , Baba Ganoush and tabbouleh salads .

text.head: Stay safe
text.p:
Be careful to check for
ticks
after hiking in fields in the bay area . There is a high rate of lyme disease transmission in the Bay Area . If a bulls ' eye rash develops at the tick bite site , immediately seek medical help and treatment with antibiotics .
text.head: Go next
